author: gkossakowski
msg: Fixed bug in ServletServiceContext that was responsible for errors on resetting response that was already committed.
Now Servlet Service Framework buffers response but only if 404 status code has been set.
This allows to reset the response safely.

author: gkossakowski
msg: Uncommented test-case snippets responsible for testing COCOON-2150 issue.

author: gkossakowski
msg: COCOON-2150: Switch to HttpServletResponseBufferingWrapper in order to correctly handle response resets.
This commit cleans up conditions for resetting the response. SSF should reset previous response only if there is a super servlet and response has NOT_FOUND (404) as status code.

author: gkossakowski
msg: COCOON-2150: Implemented class that buffers data of servlet response only if 404 as status code has been set beforehand.
Added test-cases covering basic functionality of that class.
